I am an assistant professor in the [Department of Mathematical Sciences](https://www.kent.edu/math) at [Kent State University](https://www.kent.edu). My current research is focused on the development of statistical and computational methods for applications in bioinformatics. Prior to the current position, I was a postdoctoral research associate in the lab of Olga Vitek at [Northeastern University](http://www.northeastern.edu/). I received my PhD in [Electrical Engineering](https://ece.vt.edu/) from [Virginia Tech](https://vt.edu/) in 2014.
